title: I lost my phone in India, Banglore. Pixel 3a, can I trace with IMEI
content:
I lost my mobile in India, Banglore. I could trace last location. My question is.
I) the mobile is enabled with lock number & fingerprint. Can it be factory reset even?
II) I initiated erase device, will that erase lock & fingerprint protection ?
III) How can I trace my phone with IMEI no?
IV) Can any one change IMEI number?
